topic: Daylight Events in the Bay Area on April 8 and 9
body:
Dear colleagues and friends in the Bay Area,


Some of you might be interested in two back-to-back events at the Pacific Energy Center<http://www.pge.com/en/mybusiness/services/training/pec/index.page> in San Francisco on April 8 and 9. On Wednesday, April 8th at 6.30PM, I will be giving an overview lecture on daylighting<https://pge-web.ungerboeck.com/classcalendar/Details.aspx?OrgCode=10&EventId=11612> covering topics from rules of thumb for urban massing studies to a review of a century of daylight modelling techniques. On April 9th the center will host a full day workshop on daylight simulations. Details and registration information for the latter can be found here<http://registration.daylightinghandbook.com/>. Please RSVP for either event.


Enjoy your weekend,


Christoph
Christoph Reinhart
Associate Professor
Department of Architecture
